Class ControllerProp

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ControllerProp
Direct Known Subclasses:
CohuPTZProp, MonProp, NatchProp, PelcoPProp, SampleProp, ViconPTZProp
public abstract class ControllerProp extends Object
A controller property can be queried from or stored to a controller.
Author:
Douglas Lau
